sourcesContent: function t(){return t=>t.addInitializer((t=>new o(t)))}class o{constructor(t){this.host=t,this.host.addController(this)}get root(){return this.host.shadowRoot?this.host.shadowRoot:this.host}async hostConnected(){await this.host.updateComplete,this.root.addEventListener("scroll",(()=>this.host.style.setProperty("--row-content-visibility","visibile")),{once:!0,capture:!0})}}export{o as ScrollableVisibilityController,t as scrollableVisibility};
